desc.cn: 一个开源包管理和环境管理系统，用于安装、运行和升级跨语言和跨平台的软件包和依赖关系。被广泛用于科学计算和数据科学领域
desc.en: An open-source package management and environment management system for installing, running, and updating packages and their dependencies across multiple languages and platforms. Widely used in scientific computing and data science
